  • Field Details

    • REPAINTMILLIS

      public static final long REPAINTMILLIS
      Standard millis to wait for repaint. Do not make this too high i.e. above 50 or the display gets very jerky
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      public void notifyScrollChange(long tm)
